Comment: "A bribe by any other name is still a bribe."
Author: YallerDawg

Comment: And during President Trump's first term, there were countless examples of lobbyists, diplomats, people hoping for a little quid pro quo thrown their way all choosing to stay at a Trump hotel. Just recently, the Trump org closed a deal [with the Qatari government ](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/30/world/middleeast/trump-family-qatar-dubai.html) for a massive new real estate venture ahead of a presidential trip to the Middle East.
Author: afuriousvexation
